Thanx! But enough useless OOC, let's do some quality RPGing!


--- In nbwrpg@y..., <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> Nice posts Yanshosh and Gunthers

>   From: Yanshosh@a...

>   Subject: Re: Question your eyes, mind and thought...
> 
> 
>   Actually, Prowl's mind snapped, or else he wouldn't have TFed into
his
>   second beast mode.
> 
> 
>   ::Prowl::
> 
>   Prowl's mind was only half-concious, the other half being the
beast
>   that was chasing Halucigen and imaginary Megatron. The dreams were
>   calming the Prowl half, though, but the beast was still chasing
>   Halucigen, quickly gaining on him thanks to the thrust of Prowl's
huge
>   wings.
> 
>   He snapped his head forward, trying to get Halucigen inbetween his
>   jaws, just as he was trying to get Megatron.
> 
> 
> 
>   --- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
>   > ::Halucigen::
>   > Halucigen was scanning Prowl's mind as soon as his images got
>   through
>   > and was totally caught off guard as the used to be Prowl jumped
at
>   him..
>   > "Impossible" he siad baffled..."His mind is incredbly strong to
>   fight
>   > through his worst night mare...Have to cal mhim down he said
trying
>   to
>   > flay away but the monstrous bot taking our his legs flinging him
>   > around...He started filling his mind once again but of
dreams...Him
>   > and his love alone in a dark grove with no worries to bother
them..
